data.route_analysis: Accessible through major airports, local transportation options include buses and shuttles.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best time from November to April; ideal for mild temperatures and festivals.
data.climate: Tropical climate with rainy season from May to October. Comfortably cool evenings during fall.
data.culture: Rich Mayan heritage with vibrant festivals, handicrafts, and traditions.
